task.title: Creating a Board
task.shortdesc: Directions for creating a board in Trello

step.cmd: In the top right of the webpage you will see a plus sign, click it.
A menu will be brought up displaying three different actions, choose the create board option.
Now you will see a little text box saying "add board title", this is where you will input the name of the board you wish to create.
Next, you will see "No team" this is where you will add a team if you are part of a pre-existing team. You can click no team if you are not apart of any team.
